The future buddhas of the worlds, may they realize enlightenment and quickly perfect it
The lands in the ten directions, may they all be vast and pure
Those who are approaching the bodhi tree and attaining perfect enlightenment, may all the buddha's disciples be perfected
The various kinds of beings in the ten directions, may they be free from illness, suffering, and always be at ease

Life after life, abandoning the body and receiving a body, may I always be born in a place of perfection
Relying on the supreme practices of learning and cultivation, the conduct of Samantabhadra is perfected.
The conduct of precepts is immaculate and most pure, I vow to uphold it without flaw.
Celestial beings, dragons, yakshas, kumbhandas, humans, non-humans, and all other kinds of beings,
According to their various languages and sounds, I will expound the Dharma for them.
Purely and diligently cultivating the perfections, I vow to always remember the bodhi mind.
All those who have committed offenses, I vow that they will all be eradicated without remainder.
In the path of karma, if there are various demonic ways, I will liberate them and roam freely in the world.
Not attached to the water like a lotus flower, I will cultivate without obstruction like the sun and moon.
All the realms and directions, may the sufferings of the evil destinies be eliminated.
Placing all sentient beings in a state of bliss, I will benefit the various destinies and all kinds of beings.
In order to fully cultivate bodhi, I will enter into the various practices of sentient beings.
Revealing Samantabhadra's practices and vows, practicing them for future eons
Who can practice this practice with me? May I always follow them
The actions of body, speech, and mind, may they be one with their practiced vows
Who are the good friends who delight in benefiting me, revealing Samantabhadra's practices and vows?
May I always meet with them, never harboring any disobedient thoughts towards them
The teacher of the multitude of paths, the Buddha's disciple, may I always be able to look up to them in person
Towards them, I should make great offerings, never tiring for future eons
Upholding the buddhas' supreme and wonderful Dharma, universally revealing the practice of enlightenment
If one purifies Samantabhadra's bodhisattva practices, one should practice them for future eons

Purifying the oceans of all buddha-lands, liberating the oceans of all sentient beings,
Attaining the vision of the ocean of all dharmas, observing the ocean of all wisdoms,
Purifying the ocean of all practices, perfecting the ocean of all vows,
Making offerings to the ocean of all buddhas and their assemblies, practicing for oceans of eons without weariness,
Who roams in the three times, among the most victorious, in the distinctions of the bodhisattva practices and vows,
Having cultivated the practices of Samantabhadra and reached perfect enlightenment, all without exception, I am perfectly fulfilled,
The most powerful among all the Buddha's disciples, therefore he is called Samantabhadra.
